name: 자말 카슈끄지
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, late 50s, with a neatly trimmed salt-and-pepper beard, a kind and intelligent face, wearing a dark-colored blazer over a collared shirt, often seen with a pen in his hand, suggesting his profession as a journalist. He has a thoughtful expression and a gentle demeanor. His eyes reflect a deep understanding of the world and a commitment to truth.

name: 무함마드 빈 살만
character_prompt: Saudi Arabian prince, early 30s, clean-shaven with a strong jawline, wearing a traditional white thobe and a dark-colored bisht (outer cloak) with gold embroidery, exuding confidence and authority. His gaze is direct and assertive, reflecting his position of power. He often wears a luxury watch and carries himself with a regal bearing.

name: 예언자 무함마드
character_prompt: Middle Eastern man, 50s, with a long, flowing dark beard, wearing a simple white robe and turban, radiating wisdom and serenity. His eyes are deep and compassionate, reflecting his spiritual leadership. He carries a staff as a symbol of his authority and guidance. His presence evokes a sense of reverence and respect.

name: 족장
character_prompt: A strong and weathered man, late 40s, of indeterminate ethnicity, with a muscular build and a stern face marked by the elements. He wears simple, animal-hide clothing adorned with tribal markings and feathers. He carries a spear or club, symbolizing his authority and protection of his tribe. His eyes reflect wisdom, experience, and a deep connection to the land.
